bibdata.title: Approved IEEE Draft for Standard Requirements for Liquid-Immersed Distribution Substation Transformers (Revision of C37.90-1989) Superseded by C37.90-2005
Approved IEEE Draft for Standard Requirements for Liquid-Immersed Distribution Substation Transformers (Revision of C37.90-1989) Superseded by C37.90-2005

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The scope of the guide will be the application of relays and other devices for protecting transformers used in electric power utility transmission networks and distribution systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
